articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Google temporarily restores Indian firms’ apps on Play Store after regulatory intervention - TechCrunch
articles.description: Indian firms whose apps were delisted by Google last week have begrudgingly started to comply with Play Store billing rules to return to the store.
articles.content:
Update March 5, 4.30 PM IST: Google said that it is restoring all Indian firms’ apps after both the Silicon Valley company and protesting firms met with India’s IT Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw.
